attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the leader of the Government to make it compulsory for employers to state, in a letter to the potential employee, the reason a person fails to land a job he has applied for. After all he has probably spent hours working on his CV, so i think a reply would be the least he should expect. At least out of courtesy.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
